sentences.dec8: Let’s face it, even the healthiest of eaters needs a chocolate fix from time to time, and Easter is definitely one of those times! Just because it’s chocolate though, doesn’t mean it has to be unhealthy and sugar-laden… this delicious offering contains absolutely no refined sugar or grains, and even provides one of your 5 a day (or two if you take my advice and serve with fresh seasonal berries)!

sentences.5ea6: So you see, chocolate desserts can be delicious and healthy ; you don’t have to choose one or the other!

title: Guilt-Free Easter Chocolate Fix
content: Guilt-Free Easter Chocolate Fix Let’s face it, even the healthiest of eaters needs a chocolate fix from time to time, and Easter is definitely one of those times! Just because it’s chocolate though, doesn’t mean it has to be unhealthy and sugar-laden… this delicious offering contains absolutely no refined sugar or grains, and even provides one of your 5 a day (or two if you take my advice and serve with fresh seasonal berries)! Ingredients Crust: Filling: Method So you see, chocolate desserts can be delicious and healthy ; you don’t have to choose one or the other!
